level.heading: Criminal penalties; prosecution by Corporation Counsel.
level.text: An athlete agent who violates § 47-2887.13 is guilty of a misdemeanor and, upon conviction, is punishable by maximum fine of $10,000 or imprisonment of 6 months, or both. Violations shall be prosecuted by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia in the name of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 15 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act. See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
